last_episode_to_air.name: The Debut Concert
last_episode_to_air.overview: In front of a huge congregation in Norfolk, Virginia, the choir gives an astounding, uplifting performance before receiving major news from Pharrell.

name: Voices of Fire
overview: Pharrell Williams's hometown community leaders attempt to build one of the world's most inspiring gospel choirs.
tagline: Build the choir. Let them come.

episodes.name: A Gospel Project
episodes.overview: In Hampton Roads, Virginia, during day one of the auditions, the singers belt out their best before Bishop Ezekiel Williams and the gospel leaders.

episodes.name: Searching for Unicorns
episodes.overview: Tears fall as the praises go up on day two when the judges and guest Pharrell look for one-of-a-kind vocalists who can bring the energy and emotion.

episodes.name: Decision Day
episodes.overview: After a third round of sweet surprises, the judges select 25 sopranos, 25 altos and 25 tenors and then scour venues for the choirâ€™s debut performance.

episodes.name: Shaking the Tree
episodes.overview: Choirmaster Patrick tests the finalists' abilities to harmonize during rehearsals as some are let go and others struggle to keep up.

episodes.name: Solos
episodes.overview: Days away from the group's debut, the final cuts are made. Two vocalists navigate unique challenges and are called out to sing for a solo spot.

episodes.name: The Debut Concert
episodes.overview: In front of a huge congregation in Norfolk, Virginia, the choir gives an astounding, uplifting performance before receiving major news from Pharrell.
